channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump endorses vaccine conspiracy theory in leaked call with RFK Jr.
item.description: The call allegedly came a day after Donald Trump survived an assassination attempt at a campaign rally.

item.title: Dow industrials soar 600 points, Russell 2000 gains 2% as investors embrace stocks beyond tech: Live updates
item.description: The bull market broadened out further on Tuesday with industrial and small cap shares soaring.

item.title: These Trump-linked crypto tokens have surged, but here‚Äôs the catch
item.description: Crypto traders have been doubling down their bets on a Donald Trump victory in November‚Äôs U.S. presidential election.

item.title: Andreessen Horowitz founders plan to donate to pro-Trump super PAC
item.description: Marc Andreessen and Ben Horowitz, co-founders of venture firm Andreessen Horowitz, plan to donate to PACs supporting Donald Trump's campaign.

item.title: Microsoft's hiring of staff from AI startup Inflection referred for UK merger probe
item.description: Microsoft's hiring of employees from artificial intelligence startup Inflection has been referred for an initial merger investigation in the U.K.

item.title: ‚ÄòWe don‚Äôt need a Republican Bernie Sanders‚Äô: Why Trump‚Äôs choice of Vance spooks Wall Street
item.description: Donald Trump‚Äôs choice of Sen. J.D. Vance as his running mate has some investors and executives worried that a second Trump administration could be far less friendly to corporate America than the first, given the Ohio Republican‚Äôs history of populist rhetoric and policy ideas.

item.title: Trump 2.0 could be bad news for global inflation, analysts say
item.description: A second Trump presidency could reignite global inflation as his America-first policies drive up costs across the world, analysts warned.

item.title: Man who claimed to be inventor of bitcoin referred to UK prosecutors for alleged perjury
item.description: A U.K. judge on Tuesday referred a case against Australian entrepreneur Craig Wright's claim to be the inventor of bitcoin to the Crown Prosecution Service.

item.description: TNT recently signed deals to show the French Open as well as more college sports.

item.title: Defense stocks historically benefited from Republican control. Analysts warn this may not be the case under Trump
item.description: Wells Fargo believes Trump's NATO-skeptic stance could result in reduced overseas spending.

item.title: IMF upgrades UK growth forecast in another boost to new Labour government
item.description: The upgrades come after two years of stagnation, with the U.K. falling into a shallow recession in the second half of 2023.

item.title: Why gold prices look to smash more records
item.description: Gold climbed sharply on Tuesday as bets for U.S. interest-rate cuts prompted prices to touch fresh record intraday highs, and some analysts touted long-term prospects for further gains in the precious metal.

item.title: These are America's 10 best states for buying and selling a home in 2024, with a big caveat at No. 1
item.description: These ten states are navigating high mortgage rates and tight housing inventory to host the best real estate markets in America for homebuyers and sellers.
